Headline: #70 Division Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Walton/Dearborn
ShortDescription: Eastbound 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Dearborn, Oak, Clark and Division due to street blockage near Walton/Dearborn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Dearborn, Oak, Clark and Division due to street blockage near Walton/Dearborn.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Westbound Reroute near Van Buren/Ashland
ShortDescription: WB 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Ashland, Harrison, Wolcott, Ogden, and Van Buren due to, construction near Van Buren/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Ashland, Harrison, Wolcott, Ogden, and Van Buren due to, construction near Van Buren/Ashland.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
